reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an amazing professor! Her lectures are engaging, and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Prof. Doe knows his material, but his teaching style is a bit dry. The class can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Modern History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and presents the material in an interesting way. Sometimes, the workload is a bit heavy.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very strict and not very approachable. The course is difficult, and his explanations can be unclear.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is fantastic! She explains complex concepts clearly and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Brown makes the class enjoyable with his humor and passion for literature. Sometimes, the grading is tough.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are informative, but she tends to go through the material too quickly.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Prof. Moore encourages critical thinking and class discussions. His grading can be subjective, though.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is a wonderful professor who makes economics interesting and accessible. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Prof. White's lectures are hard to follow, and he doesnâ€™t seem very interested in teaching.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is a great professor! She is very engaging and makes sociology relevant to everyday life.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Prof. Martin knows his stuff, but his lectures can be a bit boring. The exams are fair, though.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. King is passionate about art and it shows in her lectures. The class is interesting, but the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Statistics 101
reviews.review: Prof. Young is decent, but his explanations are sometimes confusing. The course is manageable with extra effort.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez is very knowledgeable and helpful. The labs are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science 101
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is amazing! He makes political science exciting and is always open to students' opinions.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's class is tough, and she has high expectations. The reading load is heavy, and the grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Allen is passionate about the environment and makes the class engaging. The field trips are a highlight!

reviews.subject: Anthropology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson is an outstanding professor! Her lectures are fascinating, and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous. The course is challenging but fair.
